com.github.i49.hibiscus.schema

Interface ArrayType

  • All Superinterfaces:
    CompositeType, JsonType
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    ArrayTypeImpl

    public interface ArrayType
extends CompositeType
    One of built-in types representing JSON array which has TypeId.ARRAY as a type identifier.

    An instance of this type can be created through SchemaComponents.array(). The method receives instances of JsonType allowed to appear as an element of the array. 

    
 import static com.github.i49.hibiscus.schema.SchemaComponents.*;
 ArrayType t = array(type1, type2, ...);

    Restrictions on this type

    This type allows you to impose following restrictions on the value space.

    1. length
    2. minLength
    3. maxLength
    4. unique
    5. assertion

    1. length

    length restricts the number of elements in the array. For instance, three-dimensional vector can be defined as follows.

    array(number()).length(3);

    2. minLength

    minLength restricts the minimum number of elements required in the array.

    array(number()).minLength(3);

    3. maxLength

    maxLength restricts the maximum number of elements allowed in the array.

    array(number()).maxLength(10);

    4. unique

    unique specifies that each value of element in the array must be unique.

    array(number()).unique();

    5. assertion

    assertion allows you to make a arbitrary assertion on the values of this type.

    See Also:
    SchemaComponents

      • items

        ArrayType items(JsonType... types)
        Specifies all JsonTypes allowed for elements of this array.

        If this method is called multiple times on the same instance, all previously declared types are not preserved and removed from this array.

        Parameters:
        types - the JsonTypes allowed for elements of this array. Each type must have a unique TypeId and cannot be null.
        Returns:
        this type.
        Throws:
        SchemaException - if one of types given has the same TypeId as others or null.

      • getItemTypes

        TypeSet getItemTypes()
        Returns the set of all JsonTypes allowed for elements of this array.
        Returns:
        the set of all JsonTypes allowed for elements of this array.
        See Also:
        items(com.github.i49.hibiscus.schema.JsonType...)

        ArrayType facet(Facet<JsonArray> facet)
        Adds a Facet which restricts the value space of this type.
        Parameters:
        facet - the facet to be added. Cannot be null.
        Returns:
        this type.
        Throws:
        SchemaException - if facet specified is null.

        Parameters:

      • assertion

        ArrayType assertion(Predicate<JsonArray> predicate,
                    ProblemDescriber<JsonArray> describer)
        Makes a assertion on the values of this type.
        Parameters:
        predicate - the lambda expression that will return true if the assertion succeeded or false if failed.
        describer - the object supplying the description of the problem to be reported when the assertion failed.
        Returns:
        this type.
        Throws:
        SchemaException - if any of specified parameters is null.
